text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
─What about the plushies I added before?

Yes. They were delighted with how cute they were, but
that's about it. They've been inadvertently left over there.
──Last week's cushions.

The other day, I found the one that Kaho was cuddling while
napping. However, the comfort level is quite good, but──

Hey, you two slackers over there!
It's fine to play around, but get to work!

If you haven't finished today's quota,
don't put off the secret base work.

Y-yeah, of course I understand, Juri-chan!
Geez...!

This room is rented for the preparation of the
live performance, right? Don't forget that.

Of course, Juri. We need to prepare here
to ensure the success of the live performance.

──But... remember. On the day we got this space,
Kaho said something. "It's like a secret base", she said.

──If that's the case, now that we've heard it,
we have an obligation to turn this into a real secret base!

That's right!
We have an obligation!

W-well, it's not really an obligation. But...
Well... I do want to surprise Kaho...
Alright, Juri-chan's on board!
Yes, she's a valuable asset.

St-Stop it...!
...So, what exactly are you planning to do?

Maybe a canopy on the wall...
It's in the realm of building construction...

──But, it'll catch on fire, won't it?
What happens when adults really try to play──...?

Well, I'm not an adult yet, and I usually play pretty seriously,
but... anyway! What happens when we give it our all──!

Heheh, thanks, both of you...!
Let's do our best to make Kaho happy!
